availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Bath County, Kentucky native. Married to Martha Ann Rogers Smoot in Bath County, Kentucky, on February 17, 1849. Father of John J. Smoot and Sarah H. Smoot. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 69B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 22.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273005, p. 597 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "W. N. Smoot (1823-1891)," Memorial #124657481, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/124657481 (accessed July 8, 2020).
